title: A-level top grades in England reach record high outside of Covid years - as it happened
description: Proportion of A*, A, B or C grades outstrip all but pandemic era in England, with similar picture in Northern Ireland and Wales
content: From 4h ago 04.32 EDT A-level top grades reach record high outside of Covid years Pamela Duncan More than 800,000 students got their A-level results today - and the topline figures indicate that many will be happy with their lot – and not just the 3,... [19447 chars]

title: Glasgow pupil, 12, who invented solar-powered backpack for the homeless makes Time magazine's Girls of the Year list
description: Rebecca Young has been honoured for designing a solar-powered backpack with an electric blanket inside to help homeless people.
content:
A Glasgow pupil who designed a solar-powered backpack with an electric blanket inside to help homeless people has been named on Time magazine's first ever Girls of the Year list.
Rebecca Young was just 11 when she came up with the idea after becoming... [2163 chars]

title: Wayne Rooney hits back at Tom Brady: ‘I don’t think he really understood football’
description: NFL legend criticised Rooney in new documentary depicting short time they worked together at Birmingham
content:
Wayne Rooney has bitten back at Tom Brady over comments aired in a recent documentary depicting their short spell working together at Birmingham.
